Kiba and Akamaru hit the opponent with [[Fang Passing Fang]], sending them airborne and criss-cross to further damage the opponent in the sky.

== Trivia ==
* The full name of this technique is {{translation|Beast Human Taijutsu Secret Art: Fang Heaven Wolf|獣人体術奥義・牙天狼|Jūjin Taijutsu Ōgi: Gatenrō|lit meaning=Beast Human Body Technique Secret Art: Fang Heaven Wolf}}.
